widgets.script:
const switchesArray = [
get("Lobby_Lights_OnOff"),
get("Outdoors_Lights_OnOff"),
get("Shop_Lights_OnOff"),
get("Air_Lock_OnOff"),
get("Walllights_OnOff"),
]
set("switch_check", true)
setVar("All_Lights_OnOff","bypass", "")

if (switchesArray.every(el => el == 0)) set("All_Lights_OnOff", 0)
if (switchesArray.some(el => el == 1)) set("All_Lights_OnOff", 1)
